com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Interface TokenResponse


  • public interface TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.

    Usage

    When you delegate an HTTP Oauth 2 Token Request to the Stormpath SDK, if the request is successful, a TokenResponse will be returned. This TokenResponse data must be sent to the OAuth client in the HTTP response. For example:

     //assume a POST request to, say, https://api.mycompany.com/oauth/token:

 public void processOauthTokenRequest(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) {

    Application application = client.getResource(myApplicationRestUrl, Application.class);

    AccessTokenResult result = (AccessTokenResult) application.authenticateOauthRequest(request).execute();

    TokenResponse token = result.getTokenResponse();

    response.setStatus(HttpServletResponse.SC_OK);
    response.setContentType("application/json");
    response.getWriter().print(token.toJson());

    response.getWriter().flush();
 }

    As you can see, toJson() will return a JSON string to populate the response body - it is not strictly necessary to read individual properties on the TokenResponse instance.

    Since:
    1.0.RC

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAccessToken()
      Returns the Access Token string that should be used by the client as the bearer token for subsequent requests.
      String getApplicationHref()
      Returns the Application Href identifying the Application this Bearer corresponds to.
      String getExpiresIn()
      Returns the Time-To-Live value that indicates for how long the access token is valid.
      String getRefreshToken()
      NOTE: Not yet supported.
      String getScope()
      Returns the space separated collection of granted scopes.
      String getTokenType()
      Returns the type of the accessToken result.
      String toJson()
      Returns all the non-values of this token response as json (body message).

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        String getAccessToken()
        Returns the Access Token string that should be used by the client as the bearer token for subsequent requests.
        Returns:
        the Access Token string that should be used by the client as the bearer token for subsequent requests.

      • getScope

        String getScope()
        Returns the space separated collection of granted scopes.
        Returns:
        the space separated collection of granted scopes.

      • getTokenType

        String getTokenType()
        Returns the type of the accessToken result. Currently only "Bearer" is returned.
        Returns:
        The type of the accessToken result. Currently only "Bearer" is returned.

      • getExpiresIn

        String getExpiresIn()
        Returns the Time-To-Live value that indicates for how long the access token is valid. After this amount of time passes, the token cannot be used.
        Returns:
        the Time-To-Live value that indicates for how long the access token is valid.

      • getRefreshToken

        String getRefreshToken()
        NOTE: Not yet supported.

        Returns the refresh token of this Bearer.

        Returns:
        the refresh token of this Bearer.
